Class GhostControl

java.lang.Object
  pacmangameplay.charactercontrol.GhostControl

public class GhostControl
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for a Ghost's movement, mode and color.

frightened

public void frightened()

setScatterTarget

public void setScatterTarget()
Sets the Ghost's next target tile to the scatter mode target. All Ghosts' scatter targets are in a corner off the maze and they consequently each move around in a different corner of the maze during scatter mode. Blinky: top right Pinky: top left Inky: bottom right Clyde: bottom left

setChaseTarget

public void setChaseTarget()
Sets the Ghost's next target tile to the chase mode target. Each Ghost has a different chase target tile.

turnBlue

public void turnBlue()
Turns the Ghost blue.

public void returnToPen()
Tells the Ghost to go to the ghost pen.
